title: Visual Studio Code
description: Microsoft Visual Studio Code lets you build and debug modern web and cloud applications. Visual Studio Code is free and available on Linux, macOS, and Windows.

title: Hugo
description: Hugo is a static HTML and CSS website generator written in Go. It is optimized for speed, ease of use, and configurability.

title: GitHub
description: GitHub is a cloud-based Git repository hosting service. It makes it easier for individuals and teams to use Git for version control and collaboration.

title: Netlify
description: Netlify is an intuitive Git-based workflow and powerful serverless platform to build, deploy, and collaborate on web apps

title: CodePen
description: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. Build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases to learn and debug, and find inspiration.

title: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics helps businesses analyze customer data from website visits. It also helps increase efficient use of resources to improve product development and profits.
